comments:
N20060421-0010

while sychronizing a file I got the following error in the log, I can not recreate this, but I had opened a file in the compare editor and had chosen Override and update from the synch view in the Team Synchronizing perspective.

Tried this again... and I can recreate it.  The NPE occurs when I used the "Copy current change from right to left" button in the editor, after which I tried to override and update the file as it turned out I had no interesting changes.  At that point I got the error dialog on updating the file.

This is the bug Tom posted to the releng list with a patch to prevent it. I suggest to take the patch since typing, CCP and other text operations can fail at any time.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 137908 ***

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 137908 ***
